title: Omicron Appears to Have Peaked in U.K., Offering Hope the Wave Is Receding
content:
1. Omicron Appears to Have Peaked in U.K., Offering Hope the Wave Is Receding  The Wall Street Journal
  2. Health experts say Omicron is headed for a sharp drop, most Americans will get infected, everyone's confused  Yahoo News
  3. Omicron could be headed for a rapid drop in Britain, US  FOX 29 Philadelphia
  4. UK may be past Omicron peak, data suggests  New York Post
  5. Omicron may be headed for a rapid drop in Britain, US  Associated Press

localize.title: オミクロンは英国でピークを迎えた模様、波が収束しつつあることを示唆
